content.verbatim_text:
Clause 4.1: Understanding the organisation and its context

The organisation shall determine external and internal issues that are relevant to its purpose and that affect its ability to achieve the intended outcome(s) of its AI management system.

structured_data.value: Understanding the organisation and its context

interpretation.summary: Understanding the organisation and its context
interpretation.applicability: All organisations deploying or developing AI systems subject to EU AI Act.
